entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of freezing rain or freezing drizzle beginning early this morning then changing to a few rain showers or periods of drizzle this morning and ending later this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
